column5: Anyone tried these for Musky/Pike? Just wondering if they work and hold up ok or do they get destroyed?
I have not used them but they must be good. Maina uses them and he never cheaps out on baits. I think he's sponsored by Sebile but I'll trust his word anytime.
I've never used them, but I'm sure they'll work, just like everything else we toss in the water  Give em a try and report back (hopefully with a pic of a trophy musky!)
I know a couple of hard-core pike guys that use them with good luck. I hope they work for the big-toothy critters. They certainly don't get good reviews as a bass lure.
I had good luck with them this year on big pike, didn't get any skis on them but out they catch one they will catch the other
